summary: In 1870s New Mexico, a half-breed kills a bigoted sheriff in self-defense but the posse that eventually hunts him finds itself in dangerous territory.
cast: Charles Bronson|Jack Palance|James Whitmore|Simon Oakland|Ralph Waite|Richard Jordan|Victor French|Sonia Rangan|William Watson|Roddy McMillan|Paul Young|Raul Castro|Lee Patterson|Roland Brand|Peter Dyneley|Hugh McDermott|Celestino Gonz√°lez|Florencio Amarilla|Verna Harvey|Sally Adez|Clive Endersby|Rebecca Wilson|Luis Amarilla|Richard Basehart|Juan Manuel Torres|Rudy Ugland
title: Chato el apache
